<h1>Fine Arts and Galleries</h1>
<p><img src="images2011/art-bank-gallery.jpg" alt="Art Bank Gallery on Massachusetts Avenue." title="Art Bank Gallery on Massachusetts Avenue." name="artbankgallery" width="640" height="427" border="0" id="artbankgallery" />
<p><strong>ABOVE:</strong> The <a href="artbank.php" title="Art Bank on AroundIndy.com">Art Bank Gallery</a> on Massachusetts Avenue in Indianapolis is one of  many galleries whose event listings appear on AroundIndy.com. <em><strong>AroundIndy.com staff photo.</strong></em></p>
<p>List your fine                   arts events free on our Web site: <a href="http://aroundindy.com/submitevents.php" title="Event Submission Information on AroundIndy.com">Submit an Event</a>.</p>
<p><strong>Located in Indianapolis unless otherwise indicated.</strong></p>

<h1>Upcoming Events</h1>

Now thru May 4, 2014: Tue-Sat 11-5 (until 9 PM on Thu/Fri), plus Sun 12-5. Info: See Web site or call 317-923-1331.<br />

	<h2>Important - Please Read</h2>

<p class="smalltext">
<strong>NOTICES.</strong> Contact the venue or its designated 
  ticket agent for ticket prices, any applicable cover charges, availability of 
  tickets, etc. All events are subject to change or cancellation, especially outdoor 
  events. Some listed events may already be sold out. All times listed are local 
  times at the venue (some Indiana venues listed on this Web site do not coincide 
  with Indianapolis time).<br />
<br />
<strong>VERIFY ALL EVENT DETAILS.</strong> All information presented
on this site is published in good faith, and we believe the information is accurate
at the time we publish it. But as much as we try 
  to prevent it, mistakes happen. Typographical errors occur. Schedules or event 
  details change after we publish an event. Vacations, sick days or emergencies 
  may preclude some venues from opening as scheduled. Businesses may change their hours of operation. Therefore, <strong>ALWAYS</strong> verify 
  the event details (time, date, location, cost, etc.) with the venue before finalizing 
  your plans--or check the venue's Web site for any updates. If you see a mistake on this page,
  please report it by using our <a href="contactus.php#feedback">Feedback Form</a>.<br />
<br />
<strong>EVENT LISTINGS.</strong> The presence of events on this 
page does NOT mean that there are no other upcoming events at this venue. Likewise, the 
  absence of events on this page on any day or days does NOT mean that the venue 
  has no events scheduled. There may be more events at this venue than just those 
  listed&#151;we publish all events that we KNOW ABOUT that meet our acceptable 
  use guidelines.<br />
<br />
<strong>EVENT ID.</strong> Please include the Reference Number found at the end of each listing when corresponding with us about an event.</p>
